verses.verse: In that <S%H3117>day,<s%> this <S%H7892>song<s%> will be <S%H7891>sung<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah:<s%> "We have a <S%H5797>strong<s%> <S%H5892>city.<s%> God <S%H7896>appoints<s%> <S%H3444>salvation<s%> for <S%H2346>walls<s%> and <S%H2426>bulwarks.<s%>
<S%H6605>Open<s%> the <S%H8179>gates,<s%> that the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%> may <S%H935>enter:<s%> the one which <S%H8104>keeps<s%> <S%H529>faith.<s%>
You will <S%H5341>keep<s%> <S%H3336>whoever<s%>'s mind is <S%H5564>steadfast<s%> in <S%H7965>perfect<s%> <S%H7965>peace,<s%> because he trusts in <S%H982>you.<s%>
<S%H982>Trust<s%> in <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5703>forever;<s%> for in <S%H3050>Yah,<s%> <S%H3050>Yahweh,<s%> is an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H6697>Rock.<s%>

For he has brought <S%H7817>down<s%> those who <S%H3427>dwell<s%> on <S%H4791>high,<s%> the <S%H7682>lofty<s%> <S%H7151>city.<s%> He lays it <S%H8213>low.<s%> He lays it <S%H8213>low<s%> even to the <S%H776>ground.<s%> He <S%H5060>brings<s%> it even to the <S%H6083>dust.<s%>
The <S%H7272>foot<s%> shall tread it <S%H7429>down;<s%> Even the <S%H7272>feet<s%> of the <S%H6041>poor,<s%> and the <S%H6471>steps<s%> of the <S%H1800>needy.<s%>"
The <S%H734>way<s%> of the <S%H6662>just<s%> is <S%H4339>uprightness.<s%> You who are <S%H3477>upright<s%> <S%H6424>make<s%> the <S%H4570>path<s%> of the righteous <S%H6662>level.<s%>

<S%H734>Yes,<s%> in the way of your <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> have we <S%H6960>waited<s%> for <S%H8034>you.<s%> Your name and your <S%H2143>renown<s%> are the <S%H8378>desire<s%> of our <S%H5315>soul.<s%>

With my <S%H5315>soul<s%> have I <S%H183>desired<s%> you in the <S%H3915>night.<s%> <S%H7307>Yes,<s%> with my spirit <S%H7130>within<s%> me will I seek you <S%H7836>earnestly;<s%> for when your <S%H4941>judgments<s%> are in the <S%H776>earth,<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H8398>world<s%> <S%H3925>learn<s%> <S%H6664>righteousness.<s%>

Let favor be <S%H2603>shown<s%> to the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> yet he will <S%H1077>not<s%> <S%H3925>learn<s%> <S%H6664>righteousness.<s%> In the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H5229>uprightness<s%> he will deal <S%H5765>wrongfully,<s%> and will <S%H1077>not<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H1348>majesty.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> your <S%H3027>hand<s%> is lifted <S%H7311>up,<s%> yet they <S%H2372>don't<s%> see; but they will <S%H2372>see<s%> your <S%H7068>zeal<s%> for the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and be <S%H954>disappointed.<s%> <S%H784>Yes,<s%> fire will <S%H398>consume<s%> your <S%H6862>adversaries.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> you will <S%H8239>ordain<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> for <S%H6466>us,<s%> for you have also worked all our works for <S%H4639>us.<s%>

<S%H113>Yahweh<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> other <S%H3068>lords<s%> <S%H2108>besides<s%> you have had <S%H1166>dominion<s%> over <S%H2142>us,<s%> but by you only will we make mention of your <S%H8034>name.<s%>

The <S%H4191>dead<s%> shall not <S%H2421>live.<s%> The <S%H7496>deceased<s%> shall not <S%H6965>rise.<s%> Therefore have you <S%H6485>visited<s%> and <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> <S%H2143>them,<s%> and caused all memory of them to <S%H6>perish.<s%>

You have <S%H3254>increased<s%> the <S%H1471>nation,<s%> O <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> You have <S%H3254>increased<s%> the <S%H1471>nation!<s%> You are <S%H3513>glorified!<s%> You have <S%H7368>enlarged<s%> all the <S%H7099>borders<s%> of the <S%H776>land.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> in <S%H6862>trouble<s%> they have <S%H6485>visited<s%> <S%H6694>you.<s%> They poured out a <S%H3908>prayer<s%> when your chastening was on <S%H4148>them.<s%>

<S%H3644>Like<s%> as a woman with <S%H2030>child,<s%> who draws <S%H7126>near<s%> the time of her <S%H3205>delivery,<s%> is in <S%H2342>pain<s%> and cries <S%H2199>out<s%> in her <S%H2256>pangs;<s%> so we have been <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>you,<s%> Yahweh.

We have been with <S%H2029>child.<s%> We have been in <S%H2342>pain.<s%> We gave <S%H3205>birth,<s%> it <S%H3644>seems,<s%> only to <S%H7307>wind.<s%> We have not <S%H6213>worked<s%> any <S%H3444>deliverance<s%> in the <S%H776>earth;<s%> <S%H1077>neither<s%> have the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H8398>world<s%> <S%H5307>fallen.<s%>

Your <S%H4191>dead<s%> shall <S%H2421>live.<s%> My dead <S%H5038>bodies<s%> shall <S%H6965>arise.<s%> <S%H6974>Awake<s%> and <S%H7442>sing,<s%> you who <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in the <S%H6083>dust;<s%> for your <S%H2919>dew<s%> is like the <S%H2919>dew<s%> of <S%H219>herbs,<s%> and the <S%H776>earth<s%> will cast <S%H5307>forth<s%> the <S%H7496>dead.<s%>

<S%H3212>Come,<s%> my <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H935>enter<s%> into your <S%H2315>rooms,<s%> and <S%H5462>shut<s%> your <S%H1817>doors<s%> behind <S%H2247>you.<s%> Hide yourself for a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H7281>moment,<s%> until the <S%H2195>indignation<s%> is <S%H5674>past.<s%>

<S%H3068>For,<s%> behold, Yahweh comes forth <S%H3318>out<s%> of his <S%H4725>place<s%> to <S%H6485>punish<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> for their <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%> The <S%H776>earth<s%> also will <S%H1540>disclose<s%> her <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and will no longer <S%H3680>cover<s%> her <S%H2026>slain.<s%>
